120953.「私は 転職をつかさどる ダーマの神殿\n ……の元柱だった身。職業を変えたいな:
I am the former pillar of Alltrades Abbey... in charge of changing vocations. If you want to change your vocation, I can help you.
However, in the tower, your level will be transferred to your new vocation, and your skills will be reset. Be careful. Now...
What would you like to do? Change Vocation Explanation

120954.「ここは 転職をつかさどる\n ダーマの神殿 出張所。\n 職業を変えたい者が:
This is the Alltrades Abbey office, which
handles vocation changes. This is the place
where people come to change vocations.
<bw_break>

120955.「そういえば モンスター牧場に\n 空きがあるようだが 連れていた\n <%sM:
By the way, it seems that there is a vacancy
at the Monster Farm, but should I send the
<%sM_monster> that you are
accompanying over there?
<yesno><break>

120956.「おや？ レベル<%nM_maxlv>に 到達しているぞ。\n 送っても これ以:
Hmm? You've reached level <%dM_maxlv>. You
won't get any more experience if I send you
back, is that all right?
<yesno><break>

120957.「……む？\n モンスター牧場で 受け取れる経験値が\n あるようだな。\n<b:
Hmm? It looks like there is experience to be received at the Monster Farm. You need to receive the experience before you can send it
to the Monster Tavern. You can keep your <%sM_monster> with you at the Monster Tavern, so you can go through the process again after
you get the experience.

120958.<color_yellow>つれている <%sM_monster>は\nモンスタ:
<color_yellow>The <%sM_monster> being carried
was sent to the monster farm!

120959.「何を 希望されるかな？\n<select_se_off>\n転職する\n説明を:
What would you like?
<select_se_off>
Change Vocation
Explanation
<select_end>
<break>

120960.「よし。今から お前は <%sM_new_syokugyou>として\n 生きて:
Good. From here on, you will go forth as a <%sM_new_syokugyou>. First, you will learn this new ability.
<%sM_self> learns Scout Strike!
This is an essential skill that you will need when trying to scout monsters. Make sure to use it on a monster you want to join you.
If you win the battle after using it, the monster may wish to join you. Scout Attack also doesn't need to deal the finishing blow.

120961.「ただし スカウトアタックを使うためには\n 仲間にしたいモンスターの名前が付い:
However, before you can use Scout Attack, you must first read a scouting book, which has the name of the monster you desire.
After reading it, you will be able to use Scout Strike against it.
Scouting books can be bought in the basement of any tavern.

120962.「もっと くわしい話は 酒場の地下にある\n モンスター酒場で聞けるぞ。\n 何:
For more information, visit the Monster Tavern in the basement of the tavern. If you need help, ask there. And don't forget to read the
Scout's Book. And don't forget to review your equipment. Now, off you go.

120963.「モンスターを仲間にする際には\n 先ほど覚えた スカウトアタックという\n <:
To companion a monster, use the <%sM_new_syokugyou> skill called Scout Strike that you just learned. You don't have to use
the Scout Strike to finish the fight.

120964.「私からの説明は 以上だが\n もう一度 聞くかね？\n<yesno><clos:
That's all I have to say, but would you like
to hear it again?
<yesno><close>

120966.「<%sM_new_syokugyou>に転職すると\n まだ なついていない:
If I move to <%sM_new_syokugyou>,
<%sM_monster> who is not yet attached will be
sent to Monster Tavern, is that OK?
<yesno><close>

120967.「よし。今から お前は <%sM_new_syokugyou>として\n 生きて:
Good. From now on, you will live as <%sM_new_syokugyou>. The first thing you need to do is wake up to a new ability...
<%sM_self> has learned the Scout Attack feat!
Scouting attacks are similar for Monster Masters and Item Masters, but they target different monsters.
You'll need to read the Scout Book for your vocation before you can take them on. Scout books can be purchased in the basement of any
tavern. You'll have a new vocation with different equipment. Don't forget to review it. Let's go.

120968.「この中では 外とは違い 呪文や特技を\n 別の職業に 引き継ぐことは出来ない。:
Unlike outside, spells and skills cannot be transferred from one vocation to another. Skill points are reset after changing
vocations. You can reallocate your skill points to the new vocation.

120969.「何について 知りたいのだ？\n<select_se_off>\n魔塔内での転職:
What do you want to know about?
<select_se_off>
About changing vocations in Tower
About Skill Points
<select_end>
<break>

120970.「スキルポイントは 本来 レベル２以上から\n 授かるものだが この塔の中にはい:
You can receive 100 skill points as soon as you enter this tower. You can also increase or decrease your skill points at any time in this
tower. It is also a good idea to reallocate your skill points according to the situation.

120971.「転職とは もちろん 職業を変えることだが\n ここでの転職は 少し特殊だ。\n:
Changing jobs means changing vocations, of course, but changing vocations here is a little different from changing vocations
outside the tower, so please listen carefully. Be careful not to forget to transfer your skill points after changing vocations.
Check your skill points before you go to the next floor.

120973.「ならば どの職業に なりたいのだ？\n<break>:
Then which vocation do you want?
<break>

120974.「では <%sM_self>よ。<%sM_new_syokugyou>の\n 気:
Now, <%sM_self>! Let us pray in the spirit of
the <%sM_new_syokugyou>. Oh Allmighty Alltrades.
Give this child a new life!
<bw_break>

120975.「……む？ お前は すでに\n <%sM_syokugyou>の職に ついている:
Hmm? You are already in the <%sM_syokugyou>
vocation. Which vocation do you want?
<break>

120976.「……ふむ。\n <%sM_new_syokugyou>に 転職するのだな？\n:
I see...so you'd like to change your vocation
to <%sM_new_syokugyou>, then?
<yesno><close>

120977.「よし。今から お前は <%sM_new_syokugyou>として\n 生きて:
Very good. From now on, the <%sM_new_syokugyou>
will be your new path. Be sure to review your
equipment and skills before you go.

120978.「よし。今から お前は <%sM_new_syokugyou>として\n 生きて:
Alright. From now on, you will live as
<%sM_new_syokugyou>. Looks like you're in
training mode now. Go on, then.

120979.「よし。今から お前は <%sM_new_syokugyou>として\n 生きて:
Very good. From now on, the <%sM_new_syokugyou>
will be your new path. Be sure to review your
equipment and skills before you go.

120980.「転職しないのだな。それも よいだろう。\n さあ 行くがよい。<end>:
You wish to not change vocations? Very well.
You may go, my child.<end>

120981.「おや？\n <%sM_monster>は 死んでいるようだな。\n このまま送:
Oh? It seems that your <%sM_monster> is not with us. How awful to just leave them like that.
If you wish to change paths, you must revive them before doing so.

120982.「おや？ お前は\n いまわしい呪いに おかされているな。\n<br>\n「転職:
Hmm? You are under a terrible curse. I think
it would be better for you to change vocations
after you get rid of the curse at the church.

122636.「……む？\n お前は 転職を行うための\n ダーマの試練を 終えていないようだ:
... No? You haven't completed the Abbey Trials to change vocations. You can't change vocations until you complete the trials. You
will be tested at the Alltrades Abbey outside the tower.

123150.<color_yellow>スキルポイントが リセットされました。\n次の階へ:
<color_yellow>Your skill points have been
reset. Before going to the next floor, you
should reallocate your skill points.
